description:
The plugin GA4 + Tag Manager works great, but it lacks a generic element data layer module.

This is a very small minimalist plugin that ONLY adds the action "Send data to GTM", which accepts any kind of data, not just events.
name: GTM Generic Data Layer
plugin_instructions:
This will NOT setup GTM. It must be used alongside with other plugins, or manual GTM setup.

1. Install and setup GA$ + Tag Manager plugin (or similar)
2. Install this plugin
3. In any workflow, add the action "Send data to GTM"
4. Add a list of variables pairs (variable_name = variable_value)
5. Configure GTM to receive the data (key)
